name: starling

preferences.name: personalAccessToken
preferences.title: Personal Access Token
preferences.description: To access your own Starling account: 1) Sign in to https://developer.starlingbank.com/login 2) Open Personal Access 3) Link your Starling account 4) Create a token with all permissions except payee:create, pay-local:create, and standing-order:create 5) Copy the token and paste it here.
preferences.placeholder: Paste your personal access token here

preferences.name: useDemoData
preferences.title: Use Demo Data
preferences.description: Show fictional sample data for screenshots and avoid Starling API calls
preferences.label: Enable demo mode with safe sample data

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
